title: Help Mee!
body:
i have a probem with patching updates in league so league say we are doing old patch  when i go to restart again this hapen. 
everytime i do this again sad restart

replies.body: If it mentioned doing an old patch again or some sort of repatch it was because some of the game files were missing or damaged most likely, which would have caused some crashing in game. Let that repatch go through, or reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if it doesn't ever seem to work.
